pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modelling Dispersion in GLM // Functions for estimating Gaussian dispersion regression models (Aitkin, 1987 doi:10.2307/2347792), overdispersed binomial logit models (Williams, 1987 doi:10.2307/2347977), and overdispersed Poisson log-linear models (Breslow, 1984 doi:10.2307/2347661), using a quasi-likelihood approach.
